articles.Title: Latest science shows that potato chips are better for you than sugar.
articles.Body: Some text, potentially containing simple markup about how potato chips are great.

articles.Title: The impact of climate change on electricity demand: review
articles.Body: Analysis of institutional adaptability to redress electricity infrastructure vulnerability due to climate change.

articles.Title: Conceptualisting, Evaluating and Reporting Social Resilience in Vulnerable Regional and Remote Communities Facing Climate Change in Tropical Queensland. Marine and Tropical Sciences Research Facility (MTSRF) Transition Project Final Report
articles.Body: Regional and remote communities in tropical Queensland are among Australiaâ€™s most vulnerable in the face of climate change.

articles.Title: Biodiversity planning-capturing multiple values in decision-making: A framework for research 2011-2015
articles.Body: Planning systems, governance structures and institutions that capture the diversity of social values and world views associated with biodiversity, and ensure mainstream community engagement in its conservation, remain elusive.

articles.Title: Climate Change Adaptation
articles.Body: The authors present the Awareness Behaviour Intervention Action (ABIA) Framework, a new system developed by them to support Environmentally Responsible Behaviour (ERB).

articles.Title: Sustainable Infrastructure in the Tropics
articles.Body: Sustainable, resilient and inclusive infrastructure lies at the heart of global development. Appropriately developed and managed, infrastructure is a powerful catalyst for promoting economic growth, social inclusion and environmental stewardship.
